channel.title: Quadry Chance on Astro Data Group
channel.description: Recent content in Quadry Chance on Astro Data Group

item.title: Finding Unresolved Stellar Companions in Kepler Planet Hosts with Gaia
item.description: At this week’s meeting, I updated the group about my project with D F-M, Andy Casey (Monash University), and Tim Morton (USC- the west coast one). We are looking into how to determine how the binarity of Kepler planet hosts influence planet formation. That sounds really exciting but “determine” is doing a lot of work in that sentence. First, we have to figure out which stars are (unresolved) binaries. There are a couple of different ways in which we’ll go about doing this, but the one highlighted this week is the fruit of Andy’s work.
